duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable workflow transactions and inquiries
Assist with utility invoicing, research, and proper coding for both stabilized and new constructions properties, and bill backs to resident’s ledgers as necessary.
Monitor invoice approval progress to ensure timely processing.
Generate weekly check runs, ensure checks print properly, and compare the check and remittance for accuracy.
Work with vendors to resolve any payment discrepancies and ensure credit memos are applied accurately.
Maintain vendor certificate of insurance, lien waivers, and W-9 forms.
Compile and prepare monthly financial reports and summaries
Assist in compiling financial, statistical data, and financial reports as required
Other duties as necessary as we define and improve upon current processes

education_certification.credential: Associate degree or relevant certification is preferred
